ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: Mahaboob Basha Kagaj is a resident of Elk Grove Village, IL, US. He has been working in the Engineering occupational sector for more than 10 years. Currently he is employed at Computer Science Corporation. So far Mahaboob has not gained any managerial experience.
